episodes.title: I Investigated the Town Overrun by Secret Cults
episodes.description:
Welcome to East Grinstead a seemingly normal town with an unusually powerful pull. From Opus Dei HQ to spiritual healers and secretive orders, it’s become the epicentre of Britain’s cult and religious scene.

In this investigation, I go deep inside. Who are these groups? Why here? And is it harmless belief… or something darker?

💬 Are cults thriving in the UK — or are we just scared of alternative lifestyles? Drop your thoughts below.

🔔 Subscribe for more real investigations:
TikTok: /willsweekends
Instagram: /willsweekends


📜 DISCLAIMER:
This documentary presents a range of perspectives for educational and journalistic purposes. The views expressed do not necessarily reflect those of the filmmaker or YouTube.

#Cults #Scientology #InvestigativeDocumentary #EastGrinstead
